preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 240 g of Bismuth using a precise digital scale. 
 2. Measure 320 g of Gallium. 
 3. Measure 40 g of Sodium. 
 4. Measure 830 g of Strontium. 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all measured materials.
